item.title: Colloquium talk: tidystats
item.description: Colloquium talk: tidystats On March 6th, 2018, I gave a colloquium talk at the methodology department of Tilburg University. You can view the slides here: View slides

item.title: Lab meeting talk: tidystats
item.description: Lab meeting talk: tidystats On January 26th, 2018, I gave a lab meeting presentation on my R package called tidystats. You can see the slides here: View slides

item.title: TIBER 2017: oTree for social scientists
item.description: TIBER 2017 talk At TIBER 2017 I gave a talk about oTree, an open-source platform for conducting web, field, and lab experiments. Below you can find a link to this talk, as well as something resembling a transcript of the talk (I like writing out what Iâ€™m going to say for a talk). My talk was mostly a demonstration of oTree, so it contains links to oTree experiments. Unfortunately I cannot promise that these links will always remain active, so check it out while you can!
